sentence: Voters in North Carolina are seeking to bar Representative Madison Cawthorn from running for re-election to his House seat, and those in Georgia are trying to do the same to Representative Marjorie Taylor Greene.
title: Only the Feds Could Disqualify Madison Cawthorn and Marjorie Taylor Greene
